item.title: 葡萄牙推出25亿欧元援助计划，致命洪灾持续蔓延
item.description: 葡萄牙政府批准了一系列紧急法案，以加速灾后重建工作。作为该国史上最大规模救灾行动之一，这项包含25亿欧元（约合29亿美元）援助计划的举措，旨在消除行政障碍。【原文：Portugal’s government approved a set of emergency laws to speed reconstruction after deadly flooding, clearing administrative hurdles as part of a €2.5 billion ($2.9 billion) support package in one of the largest disaster-relief efforts ever mobilized by the country.】

item.title: 法国极右翼人士巴尔代拉称生态是"普世价值"
item.description: 法国极右翼领袖、潜在总统候选人乔丹·巴尔代拉表示，环境问题并非左翼政党的专属领域。【原文：French far-right leader and potential presidential candidate Jordan Bardella said the environment isn’t the exclusive domain of left-wing parties.】

item.title: Another Cold Blast to Grip US Northeast, Testing Power Demand
item.description: The US Northeast, including New York City, will get a brief touch of snow this weekend before a frigid blast of arctic air pushes through the region, leaving winter-weary residents shivering and putting additional stress on power grids and energy prices.

item.title: China’s Secret Superpower in the AI Race
item.description: Its “tremendous” energy growth could be the deciding factor in the AI race.

item.title: Europe to Soften Emissions Curbs on Companies in Flagship Market
item.description: The European Union is set to relax emissions-reduction rules for thousands of companies, recalibrating the world’s most rigorous carbon market under pressure from industry and governments concerned about the region’s sinking competitiveness.

item.title: 台湾或将再次推迟实现绿色能源目标的时间表
item.description: 台湾政府警告称，由于项目延误和政策调整拖累，可再生能源的推广进展低于预期，该岛实现绿色能源目标可能需要更长时间。【原文：Taiwan’s government warned the island may take longer to hit its green energy target as the rollout of renewable power falls short of expectations, weighed down by project delays and policy shifts.】

item.title: 中国希望为无人机和飞行出租车提供更精准的天气预报
item.description: 中国已委托国家气象局制定气象框架，以支持未来几年可能在城市间穿梭的无人机、飞行出租车及其他电动飞机的预期浪潮。【原文：China has tapped its national meteorological bureau to develop a weather framework to support an expected wave of drones, flying taxis and other electric aircraft that may be zipping through its cities in coming years.】

item.title: 米兰奥运住房设计便于轻松再利用
item.description:
本届冬奥会新建的运动员住宿设施将转为学生宿舍，有助于减少碳排放。

【原文：

New athlete accommodations for this year’s winter games will convert to student dorms, helping to cut emissions.

】

item.title: 特朗普执政期间环境执法力度如何下降
item.description:
根据一家环保监督组织的新报告，联邦官员在法庭上起诉污染者的数量正在减少。

【原文：

Federal officials have been going after fewer polluters in court, according to a new report by an environmental watchdog group.

】

item.title: 应对电力大危机的解决方案无处不在
item.description:
分布式能源资源能否缓解全球电力短缺？赫斯克电力系统公司首席执行官马诺吉·辛哈对此持肯定态度。【原文：

Can distributed energy resources help alleviate the global shortage of electricity? Manoj Sinha, chief executive officer of Husk Power Systems, thinks so.

】

item.title: 中国太阳能游说团体预计今年新增装机量将大幅下滑
item.description: 中国太阳能行业预计2026年装机量将大幅下滑，原因是去年出台的政策调整可能导致可再生能源发电收入锐减。【原文：China’s solar industry is expecting a massive drop-off in installations in 2026 due to a policy shift instituted last year that has threatened to slash revenue from renewable generation.】

item.title: 中国加速能源建设，马斯克称其为人工智能竞赛的关键
item.description: 中国持续扩张的能源设施新数据印证了埃隆·马斯克和黄仁勋的警告：该国世界领先的电力网络将在人工智能主导权竞争中为其赢得压倒性优势。【原文：New data on China’s relentless energy installations underscore warnings from Elon Musk and Jensen Huang that the nation’s world-beating power network will deliver a major advantage over the US in the race to dominate artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 伯克希尔公用事业公司紧急呼吁遏制野火，数十亿美元利益攸关
item.description: 伯克希尔·哈撒韦旗下的太平洋电力公司正请求上诉法院撤销2023年陪审团在野火集体诉讼案中的裁决，该裁决使该公司面临数十亿美元的损失。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s PacifiCorp is asking an appeals court to throw out a 2023 jury verdict in a wildfire class-action case that has exposed the company to billions of dollars in losses.】

item.title: 中国对欧盟风电补贴调查提出"严重关切"
item.description: 中国批评欧盟对中国风电企业补贴展开深入调查，称此举具有保护主义性质，并誓言将采取行动维护国家利益。【原文：China criticized the European Union’s in-depth probe into subsidies for Chinese wind power companies, calling the move protectionist and vowing it would take action to protect the country’s interests.】

item.title: 冬奥会如何在变暖的世界中适应变化
item.description: 全球顶级冬季体育赛事正面临着更炎热、更少雪的未来。【原文：The world's premier winter sports event is facing a future with more heat and less snow.】

item.description:
在电网压力日益增大的背景下，月能公司正计划扩大其家庭储能业务。 

【原文：

Lunar Energy wants to expand its home storage business at a time when the grid is increasingly under strain. 

】

item.title: 富达指出极端天气适应性投资的局限性
item.description: 随着极端天气日益频繁，投资者正审视气候适应措施究竟能带来多少实际收益。【原文：As extreme weather becomes more frequent, investors are examining how much money can realistically be made from climate adaptation.】

item.description:
随着风暴日益加剧，储能及其他备用电源正变得越来越重要。【原文：

Energy storage and other sources of backup power are becoming more important as storms get worse. 

】

item.title: 去年基金经理遭遇ESG标签历史性资金撤离
item.description: 晨星公司报告显示，去年具有ESG投资目标的基金遭遇840亿美元资金流出，标志着全球此类产品市场首次出现净赎回。【原文：Funds with ESG investment goals saw $84 billion in outflows last year, marking the first time the global market for such products was hit by net redemptions, according to a report by Morningstar Inc.】

item.title: 日本滑雪场迎来旺季，大雪吸引游客纷至沓来
item.description: 持续一个月的强降雪使日本滑雪场在开季缓慢后重获生机，吸引了美国及其他海外游客再度前来追寻粉雪乐趣。【原文：A month of heavy snowfall has revived Japan’s ski resorts after a slow start to the season, drawing renewed interest from Americans and other overseas visitors in search of fresh powder.】

item.title: 马斯克团队造访消息推动中国太阳能股上涨
item.description: 中国太阳能股价上涨，此前当地媒体报道称SpaceX和特斯拉公司的团队已访问国内企业，提振了市场情绪。【原文：Chinese solar stocks rallied after local media reported that teams from SpaceX and Tesla Inc. had visited domestic companies, buoying sentiment.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将向土耳其太阳能项目投资20亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将投资约20亿美元在土耳其建设太阳能发电厂，这是两国在可再生能源生产领域更广泛合作协议的第一阶段。【原文：Saudi Arabia will invest around $2 billion to build solar power plants in Turkey, in the first stage of a broader deal between the countries on renewable-energy production.】

item.title: 当冬奥会无法依靠冬季时会发生什么
item.description:
自科尔蒂纳首次举办冬奥会以来，这座意大利小镇的二月气温已上升3.6摄氏度。未来一个世纪的情况将更加严峻。【原文：

In the 70 years since Cortina first held the Winter Games, February temperatures in the Italian town have warmed 3.6C. The next century is going to be worse.

】

item.title: 中国将出台新电网备用政策以促进电池产业发展
item.description: 中国政府将通过扩大对储能补贴的力度，助力支撑全国范围内大规模电池的蓬勃发展。【原文：The Chinese government will help underpin the nationwide boom in large-scale batteries by expanding its subsidies for energy storage.】

item.title: Can Wind Power Survive Trump’s Efforts Against It?
item.description: US President Donald Trump has aggressively sought to thwart the wind power industry. Within hours of returning to the White House in 2025, Trump issued a directive that froze new permitting for wind energy and ordered officials to consider terminating existing leases. In December, his administration ordered a pause to five East Coast projects under construction due to unspecified national security concerns.

item.title: 特朗普的"金库计划"助力美国关键矿产初创企业
item.description:
风险投资家和企业将这笔计划中的120亿美元基金视为解锁该领域更多投资的途径，该领域对清洁技术同样至关重要。【原文：

Venture capitalists and companies see the planned $12 billion fund as a way to unlock more investments in the sector that’s also crucial to clean tech. 

】

item.title: 澳大利亚世界领先的太阳能技术推动家用电池热潮
item.description: 澳大利亚家庭——其人均屋顶太阳能板装设量已位居全球前列——在2025年下半年安装的储能电池数量，已达到此前五年总量的水平。【原文：Australian households — already world leaders in the number of rooftop solar panels per capita — installed as many batteries in the second half of 2025 as they did during the previous five years combined.】

item.title: 为何医院正逐步淘汰一种常用的手术室麻醉剂
item.description:
数十年来用于麻醉患者的氟烷，其环境足迹远超预期，医疗服务提供者正转向污染更少的替代品。

【原文：

Desflurane, which has put patients to sleep for decades, has an outsized footprint, and health care providers are switching to less-polluting alternatives.

】

item.title: 西门子能源将投资10亿美元进军美国市场，借势电力行业蓬勃发展
item.description: 西门子能源公司将在未来两年内投资10亿美元（8.47亿欧元）用于美国制造产能建设，以应对电力需求的激增。【原文：Siemens Energy AG will invest $1 billion (€847 million) in manufacturing capacity in the US over the next two years as power demand surges.】
